name: Immigrate to Maranhão
description: Maranhão is a Brazilian state in the Northeast Region with a population of about 7 million, known for its dunes in Lençóis Maranhenses National Park, UNESCO-listed São Luís, babassu palm forests, and mangroves along the Atlantic coastline.
keywords: Maranhão, São Luís, Lençóis Maranhenses, babassu, mangroves, Northeast Brazil, UNESCO site
